para.text: The fixture manual operation panel is located at the bottom of the main operation panel.

body.para: The lamps of each button will indicate the current status of the fixture. Manual mode must be enabled for the buttons on the fixture operation panel to be functional. The [AUTO/MAN] button will be lighted when Manual mode in turned On.
